creditline: The Robert C. Winton Fund and the Mr. and Mrs. Bernard M. Granum Fund
description: older woman in profile from PL, with head turned toward picture plane, wearing a white one-piece swimsuit, seated with her PL leg drawn up, at the edge of a swimming pool; black and white pool tiles beneath woman, spelling out "DEEP"; woman leans against pool railing; pink background; splotchy brown burned areas with some inherent holes and losses; received in black "sandwich" frame
medium: Acrylic, pencil, and ink on burned paper
title: Pink Honey
